testcase.classname: Acceptance testing to validate Search cars page is working fine.
testcase.name: Validate egg timer functionality
testcase.failure:
Given user is on the Home Page "https://e.ggtimer.com/" of eggtimer website.passed And the page title should be "e.ggtimer - a simple countdown timer".........passed And user enter timer on timer box...........................................failed Then click on "start" link..................................................skipped Then timer starts on decreasing order.......................................skipped And after that "Time Expired!" message should be displayed..................skipped
